amendment.description: To prohibit the granting of registered provisional immigrant status until the Secretary has maintained effective control of the borders for 6 months.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1195 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 43. Record Vote Number: 148.
Amendment SA 1195 proposed by Senator Grassley.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1195 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 43. Record Vote Number: 148.
